blogPost.title: What can managers do to keep their employees engaged and curious? Answer by Hector Aguilar, President of Technology at @okta. https://t.co/y8mETIkPD1 https://t.co/cbIC7fEr4Z
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 管理者如何才能让员工保持参与感和好奇心？由@okta技术总裁Hector Aguilar回答。https://t.co/y8mETIkPD1 https://t.co/cbIC7fEr4Z。

previous.title: What do you mean by cyber resiliency and how is it different from cyber security? Answer by Rebecca Gott, Distinguished Engineer, IBM Z & LinuxONE, Blockchain, ZaaS. https://t.co/KN5vw7NUQS https://t.co/4Eq341i8dm

localize.full_text: 什么叫网络弹性，与网络安全有什么不同？由IBM Z & LinuxONE、区块链、ZaaS杰出工程师Rebecca Gott回答。https://t.co/KN5vw7NUQS https://t.co/4Eq341i8dm。
